DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test two new MRI ( magnetic resonance imaging ) sequence see compare previously use imaging sequence may improve quality abdominal MRI .
DOC.brief_title: T2 Weighted Imaging Liver With Fast Spin Echo MRI
DOC.detailed_description: - Approximately 50 patient undergoing routine liver MRI practice image one 4 clinical scanner undergo standard liver MRI protocol addition 2 breath-hold sequence ( FSE Flex eSSFSE ) increase scan time approximately 3 minute . - Data retrieve examination perform patient 's electronic imaging file store picture archive communication system ( PACS ) . - Images completely anonymized . No patient identifier available image analysis . - Analyses include visual assessment image quality , presence severity image artifact non-invasive imaging outcome perform radiologist blind patient information type sequence perform . Data present Likert type scale ( 1=poor , 2=suboptimal , 3=average , 4=above average 5=excellent ) image parameter compare use Wilcoxon sign rank test .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo routine liver MRI image one 4 clinical scanner ( MR 750W , General Electric , Milwaukee WI ) Patients undergoing routine liver MRI
DOC.keyword: FSE Flex ( recently develop MRI pulse sequence )
Enhanced single shot FSE ( fast spin echo ) .
